headers.subject: [tosdr:2902] Gittip: [Bad] Can change privacy policy without notice

subject: Gittip: [Bad] Can change privacy policy without notice
text:
Title: [Bad] Can change privacy policy without notice
Topic: changes-notice
Summary: Policy states that it can change occasionally, but that the only effort made to show that it changed is a change of the date of the policy.
Score: 40

> Gittip may change this Policy from time to time. If we make any changes to the Policy, we will change the "Last Updated" date above.

Discussion:

Like the ToS, Gittip can change it at any time, but at least the privacy policy explicitly states that the date will be incremented when there are changes.

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
